plot: Fan-film based on the graphic novel written by Grant Morrison and illustrated by Dave Mckean.(Batman created by Bob Kane) A fake-trailer of a hypothetical film adaptation of the comic-book "Arkham Asylum: A serious house on serious earth"
title: Arkham Asylum Fan Film
plot_es: Fan-film based on the graphic novel written by Grant Morrison and illustrated by Dave Mckean.(Batman created by Bob Kane) A fake-trailer of a hypothetical film adaptation of the comic-book "Arkham Asylum: A serious house on serious earth"
plot_en: Fan-film based on the graphic novel written by Grant Morrison and illustrated by Dave Mckean.(Batman created by Bob Kane) A fake-trailer of a hypothetical film adaptation of the comic-book "Arkham Asylum: A serious house on serious earth"
